title: Um what the actul is going on with the new client?
body: Im actually so pissed because I have received a fucking buster today because the client froze and wouldn't let me chose a champion, because apparently there was an error with chosing a champ? like wth, last chance riot, or I will definitely be leaving league for good, and ill take a fair few players with me

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC is having a hard time keeping a solid connection to our matchmaking platform. This usually occurs if there are incompatible network settings on your local network, so I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this.

If you continue to experience these issues after taking those steps, let me know.
